name: Senior DataBase Developer (Oracle)
description: We are looking for talented developer to join our team. This role will be focusing on design data structure and implementation back-end logic for DB Oracle. Also you will be in charge of setup data replication and developing API for data access for application servers in C++. Responsibilities: - Solve interesting and complicated tasks- Develop data structure and server logic of DBMS Oracle for high load telecommunication service, working 24/7- Support created code for whole lifecycle- Work with legacy code- Diagnose and fix the system issues- Work using Agile methodology, participate in improving process of development and incresing team work efficiency- Collaborate closely with product manager, QA, developers of related with DB services Experience/Qualifications: - 3+ years of PL/SQL programming- Solid knowledge of Oracle database products- Design and development experience of distributed DB- Basic knowledge С++/MSVC- Analytical thinking and experience dealing with high load data processing applications- Good understanding of full software development life cycle- Intermediate English Would be a plus: - Knowledge of data replication technology (Golden Gate)- Experience with other DBMS (PostgreSQL, MySQL)- Experience in telecommunication   Conditions:  Well coordinated professional team. Cutting edge technologies, interesting and challenging tasks, dynamic project, great opportunities for self-realization, professional and career growth. Corporate training programs, English language courses. Business trips (U.S., Philippines, China) and further work in the foreign branch office (U.S.).. Job placement and payment of salary take place according to the labor code. Sick leaves 100% paid. 28 day vacation 100% paid in accordance with the current salary. Medical assistance (voluntary health insurance, dental insurance, office doctor). Great working conditions, modern business center, cycle parking, equipped kitchens, tea, coffee, soft drinks and sweets. Corporate events, trips, sports. Office in 15-minute walk from the subway. Nonresident applicants are granted Relocation Bonus and help in finding accommodation in St. Petersburg.
